original_title: ボクの人生を狂わせた担任教師に童貞を奪われてから早10年経ちました。 葵つかさ
overview: "My first love partner, my first experience was my homeroom teacher." A pure love sexual intercourse drama depicting a secret physical relationship over 10 years that no one can tell. The days of Platonic SEX that I hid in the school and asked for it many times. Even after graduation, when they meet again at the alumni association, they burn up and seek each other at the hotel. I can't forget about Mr. Tsukasa after getting married ...
title: It's Been Ten Years Since My Home Room Teacher Took My Virginity And Turned My World Upside-Down. Tsukasa Aoi
